name: ibowankenobi-i-pv
description: Interactive Protein Sequence VIsualization/Viewer - Interactive Circos

scripts.setGit: npm run gitAddAll && npm run gitCommit && npm run gitTag && npm run gitPush && npm run gitPushTags
scripts.publishPatch: npm run bumpPatch && npm run publishRest
scripts.publishMinor: npm run bumpMinor && npm run publishRest
scripts.publishMajor: npm run bumpMajor && npm run publishRest
